channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

US military says standards for investigating sex assault claims to remain unchanged
item.description: The U.S. military's standards for investigating sexual assault claims will remain unchanged, a senior official told reporters on Thursday.

item.title: Michael Waltz expected to depart as Trump's national security adviser, sources say
item.description: President Donald Trump's national security adviser Michael Waltz is expected to leave his post, sources familiar with the decision told ABC News.

item.title: WATCH: What TSA wants you to know about new Real ID requirements
item.description: Adam Stahl, TSA senior official performing the duties of the administrator, discusses essential details regarding Real ID.

item.title: 5/1: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: New economic data shows the U.S. economy shrank early this year. Also, Tessa Bonhomme and Julia Tocheri on women’s hockey podcast "Jocks in Jills."
